column2: summarize(across(c(Diag, Diagnoses, Comorbidities, Comorbiditiesc, Gender, Age, BMI, ncom, bmi, Year, Period,
Age           <- glm(cost ~ Age,           family = "poisson", data = resm_s3)
Gender        <- glm(cost ~ Gender,        family = "poisson", data = resm_s3)
BMI           <- glm(cost ~ BMI,           family = "poisson", data = resm_s3)
Diagnoses     <- glm(cost ~ Diagnoses,     family = "poisson", data = resm_s3)
Comorbidities <- glm(cost ~ Comorbidities, family = "poisson", data = resm_s3)
Diag          <- glm(cost ~ Diag,          family = "poisson", data = resm_s3)
Period        <- glm(cost ~ Period,        family = "poisson", data = resm_s3)
fit_uni <- list(Age, Gender,BMI, Comorbidities, Diagnoses, Diag, Period)
fit_mul <- glm(cost ~ Age + Gender + BMI + Comorbidities + Diagnoses + Diag + Period, family = "poisson", data = resm_s3)
aps3 <- lars_forestmodel(fit = fit_mul, lst = fit_uni, palb = pala, pala="grey60")
